pixi.plugins.particles.cloudkid.AnimatedParticle

type
class
metadata
:native
"cloudkid.AnimatedParticle"

Constructor

new(e : Emitter)
parameters
{Emitter} emitter The emitter that controls this AnimatedParticle.
An individual particle image with an animation. While this class may be functional, it has not gotten thorough testing or examples yet, and is not considered to be release ready.

Instance Methods

applyArt(art : Array<pixi.textures.Texture>) : Void

parameters
{Array<pixi.textures.Texture>} art An array of pixi.textures.Texture objects for this animated particle.
Sets the textures for the particle.

destroy() : Void

Destroys the particle, removing references and preventing future use.

init() : Void

Initializes the particle for use, based on the properties that have to have been set already on the particle.

update(delta : Float) : Void

parameters
{Float} delta Time elapsed since the previous frame, in __seconds__.
Updates the particle.
